name: Sandiwch Factory (raylib Edition)
description:
So I remade my first unity game but in raylib (a C library). For now, I've only made the first 3 levels but the rest should be done in not too long since I've created most of the things I need to create the other levels.

The .zip includes the graphics since that's what I need for the game to work.

Fun facts: The original game was nearly 20 mB while this is only 6 mB!

If you took out the soundtrack, the game would only be 1,098kB!
